data.title: Zooropa 30th anniversary vinyl reissue – SuperDeluxeEdition
data.text:
U2 / All That You Can’t Leave Behind vinyl set – unboxed

Watch the unboxing video SDEtv lifts the lid off U2‘s enormous All That You Can’t Leave Behind vinyl box set which contains 11 pieces of vinyl and a book. Watch the video… The reissue of All That You Can’t Leave Behind is out now. It comes with a download code. Other formats include a five-CD super deluxe, 2LP vinyl and 2CD deluxe edition.
